TopicTitle: [Question] How do I determine that stages of a craft via the craft file.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys/gals, i'm trying to find out how the craft file describes stages of the ship. I'm having a rough time since I cant 100% determine how stages are represented in craft files.

i'm beginning to suspect that the value of, 

istg = 0

has something to do with it but like I said i'm not 100% on that. In fact I don't even know that "istg" would stand for or for that matter what, 

istg = 0
dstg = 0
sidx = 0
sqor = 0
attm = 0

any of these would mean.

Hoping that someone has figured this out all ready but if not then maybe we can try to figure it out?

Thanks all!
